name: Salmadore's Adventures2
description:
This game is also a canceled game. It's second version of salmadore's adventure game. It was created in game maker studio.

Features:

-6 type of mobs, 1 boss

-2 abillities

-Upgradable scrolls, you have to find the mage and there you can upgrade scroll(but it has bug, you cant quit if you have entered mage craft menu second time)

-shop

-3 swords

other: you can mine boulders to get pcs of stone to sell them, you can collect apples to restore hp
